product_title: GiveBest Portable Electric Space Heater with Thermostat, 1500W/750W Safe and Quiet Ceramic Heater Fan, Heat Up 200 Square Feet for Office Room Desk Indoor Use, Silver
product_availability: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
about_product: 2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting. It will cycle on and off. Adjust the setting of thermostat from 41℉ to 95℉ to keep room comfortable

Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted

Compact and powerful: The mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don't want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters

Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame resident. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

product_information.Special Feature: Energy Efficient, Lightweight, Manual Thermostat, Overheat Protection, Portable, Safety fuse inside, Thermostat Control, Tip-Over Protection

customers_say: Customers find the space heater effective and reliable, with good heat output that quickly warms rooms and is particularly suitable for small spaces like offices and bathrooms. They appreciate its compact size and consider it well worth the price. The noise level receives mixed feedback, with some customers finding it relatively quiet while others say it's a little loud.

top_reviews.review_title: Perfect Balance of Comfort, Safety, and Style
top_reviews.review_comment: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️The Portal Electric Space Heater works amazingly well! It heats up my room fast, runs quietly, and has great safety features like auto shut-off and tip-over protection. Super easy to use, compact, and energy efficient — perfect for keeping warm without high bills. Highly recommend!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Great little heater! I have a 9x12 room I needed it in and even on the low setting it warmed it up quickly and kept it toasty. I really like that it has safety features. Even if you go to move it slightly it turns off and stops the heat flow. I think that is a really great safety feature as a fireman’s daughter! I would totally get another one!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This is a great little heater. My office is freezing. This heater brings it to a comfortable temperature. Not too hot. I love that when you pick it up, it shuts off immediately. Great buy. I highly recommend!

top_reviews.review_comment: The heater just gave out on me this morning after 1.5 years and I used it a lot all the time cus I get cold fast and sometimes when I’m lazy I would sit in front of it to watch tv and dry my hair it was really warm// the noise isn’t crazy loud it like white noise //it was a good heater

top_reviews.review_title: Efficiency Meets Safety: GiveBest Portable Electric Space Heater Delivers Comfort Without Compromise
top_reviews.review_comment: Pros: Quick heating capability (warms up to 200 square feet in minutes) Selectable power settings (1500W/750W) for energy efficiency Built-in thermostat for maintaining desired temperature Compact and lightweight design for easy portability Safety features (overheat protection and tip-over switch) Quiet operation, suitable for office use Cons: Limited to smaller spaces; may not be effective for larger rooms Slightly higher noise level at maximum setting, although still generally quiet Heats unevenly in larger, open spaces Detailed Description: The GiveBest Portable Electric Space Heater is powered by a ceramic heating element that heats up quickly, making it ideal for personal spaces like an office or bedroom. With two heat settings (1500W or 750W), users can choose the right level of warmth for their comfort. The built-in adjustable thermostat allows you to set and maintain your preferred temperature without the need for constant adjustments. Comparison: When comparing the GiveBest heater to other portable heaters on the market, it stands out for its combination of safety features and efficient heating. Unlike some basic models, the GiveBest unit includes an overheat protection system and a tip-over switch that automatically shuts the heater off if it falls over, making it safer for home use. Ease of Use: Setup is effortless; simply plug it in, select your desired power setting, and adjust the thermostat. The heater features a straightforward interface that makes it accessible for users of all ages. Being lightweight and compact, it can be easily moved from room to room. Performance: The heater delivers impressive performance in warming up smaller spaces quickly. Even on the lower setting, it produces noticeable warmth and is ideal for creating a comfortable environment during colder months. However, in very large or open areas, it might struggle to heat effectively. Features: 1500W and 750W power settings Adjustable thermostat Ceramic heating technology Safety features: overheat protection and tip-over switch 200 square foot heating capacity Compact and portable design Quality: The quality of construction is satisfactory with durable materials. The ceramic heating element provides efficient heating without excessive energy consumption. The design is aesthetically pleasing and fits well in most décor styles, whether at home or in an office. Value for Money: Considering its features, performance, and quality, the GiveBest Portable Electric Space Heater offers excellent value for money. It's an affordable option for those looking to add supplemental heating to their space without breaking the bank. Experience Using the Product: My experience using the GiveBest heater has been positive overall. It effectively warms up my office space, creating a comfortable working environment during chilly days. I appreciate the quick heating time and the flexibility of selecting different power levels based on my needs. Recommendation: I highly recommend the GiveBest Portable Electric Space Heater for anyone in need of an efficient and safe heating solution for small spaces. It is particularly suitable for office use or personal areas where additional warmth is required. With its robust safety features and user-friendly design, it is a reliable choice for winter comfort. Conclusion: In conclusion, the GiveBest Portable Electric Space Heater combines safety, efficiency, and ease of use, making it a top choice for individuals seeking to enhance their comfort in small indoor spaces. With its numerous features and value for money, it’s a product that has proven itself worthy of investment for any household or office.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2024

top_reviews.review_comment: It warms me up quickly after my shower. Shuts off quickly if it tips over, or if you pick it up. It has two speeds. That’s all you need. It’s small and powerful for a small bathroom.

top_reviews_global.review_comment: المنتج رديئ وزوايه حادة ومحول الكهرباء لايعمل في بلدي
top_reviews_global.review_date: Reviewed in the United Arab Emirates on October 30, 2022

top_reviews_global.review_comment: I'm not sure about the thermostat as it's never shut off on its own while using the heat (it doesn't turn on for the fan unless the thermostat thing is set at a certain point though). It does get a bit warm but nothing disturbingly so. I have a small living room and kitchen - in the living room I'll put it across from the electric fireplace and turn it on and in no time my cold basement suite is a nice toasty 75. It's a little noisy but not overbearing. In the kitchen I'll put it on one side and another smaller space heater on the other and my kitchen, which is always cold, warms up in about 15 minutes and stays warm long enough for me to cook some food. My basement suite loses heat rather quickly (landlord's special) but running this for 5-10 minutes warms it up enough to be comfortable. I also like that it has a fan - since my kitchen doesn't have a vent or ventilation of any sort, I open the window in my living room, set this fan at the window and aim it towards the kitchen, and set another fan on the oven and force air from outside through the house and into the bathroom which does have a fan and ventilation. It's powerful enough to send the air across the living room. Would recommend. It's a good heater.

So this heater is small in size but works amazing. I have it sitting on a dresser in my babies room. We’re in a basement suite and it gets chilly sometimes. This heater heats up a large room within a couple minutes. You can adjust to how much heat you want coming out at once as well as the temperature dial. Once the room heats up to the temp you adjusted it to, it will turn off. And it will turn back on when the temperature drops. The safety feature is amazing as well, the second it’s picked up, moved, or tilted in the slightest it cuts all power. So you don’t have the risk of it falling onto something while blowing heat and causing damage or fire. It also doubles as a fan and blows non heated air if you want as well.
